snippet.title: Detective Dotson - PC Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Indian Indie Cosy Mystery Adventure Detective Dotson PC Release Date Revealed for April 3, 2025

Detective Dotson is a mystery adventure game set in a stylised rendition of modern-day India that puts players in the role of Dotson, a reluctant detective. Players can wishlist the game from the Steam store page right now. A demo for the game is out on Steam as well.


A Fork Media Group Co.

About IGN India 

IGN India is your premier destination for video game reviews, latest updates on games, game development, movies and entertainment, all with a pinch of Indian masala!
